thread.title: Kate Wright returns to TOWIE filming after blasting claim she wants to quit for I'm A Celebrity role instead
thread.title_full: Kate Wright returns to TOWIE filming after blasting claim she wants to quit for I'm A Celebrity role instead

author: Lara Martin
title: Kate Wright returns to TOWIE filming after blasting claim she wants to quit for I'm A Celebrity role instead
text:
Kate Wright returns to TOWIE filming after blasting claim she wants to quit for I'm A Celebrity role instead The blonde beauty's rep branded the claim "rubbish" and said Kate is committed to the ITVBe show Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
She recently blasted claims she was quitting TOWIE in a bid to join I’m A Celebrity… Get Me Out Of Here! instead. 
And reality beauty Kate Wright proved just that over the weekend as she turned up for filming on the ITVBe show in Essex. 
The blonde star - who has been linked to former footballer Rio Ferdinand in recent weeks - joined her The Only Way Is Essex castmates to film St Patrick’s Day scenes at a local club. 
Kate flaunted her stunning hourglass body in a fitted pale green dress, in keeping with the St Patrick’s Day theme. She covered up in a fluffy pale coat, which she wore Kardashian-style thrown over her shoulders. Kate seen arriving at Faces club in Essex (Photo: FameFlynet) The star has blasted claims she's leaving TOWIE (Photo: FameFlynet) Read More TOWIE's James Lock reveals truth behind Kate Wright's relationship with Rio Ferdinand 
She stepped out following rumours she wanted to hand in her TOWIE notice for pastures anew; specifically, a place in the Australian jungle later this year. 
A source had told Daily Star: "She knows casting for I’m A Celebrity begins in the spring and she’s knows if she gets picked she could leave TOWIE." 
But her rep dismissed the claim as "rubbish". 
“Whilst Kate is a fan of I’m A Celebrity, she loves TOWIE and has a great relationship with the show so has no plans to leave right now,” the spokesperson told The Sun . She's going nowhere! (Photo: FameFlynet) Kate is a fan of the jungle but isn't quitting TOWIE for it (Photo: REX) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Watch Next 
Kate, meanwhile, hasn’t addressed the rumour on her social media accounts. 
Nor has she spoken about the claims she’s been getting close to ex-Manchester United and England star Rio. 
They were linked back in January, with a source saying Rio and Kate have been going on nights out together with friends but are keeping their relationship low-key for now. 
Rio's wife Rebecca died in May 2015 from breast cancer. Kate pictured filming TOWIE last year (Photo: Rex) Rio has not commented on the claims of a romance with Kate either (Photo: Getty) Read More Tattoo Fixers star Paisley Billings heading into I'm A Celebrity jungle 'to be the next Scarlett Moffatt' 
A source told The Sun : "Rio and Kate have enjoyed spending time with each other with other friends. 
"There's a real connection there but Rio is in no rush to turn this into a serious relationship." 
The insider went on to say that Rio, 38, is putting his three children first, which may explain why he and Kate haven't yet gone public. 
"But Kate is very smitten with him and therefore happy to wait and see what happens," the source added. Kate split from Dan Edgar last year (Photo: FameFlynet) 
It comes after TOWIE fans saw Kate brokenhearted at her split from co-star Dan Edgar in the summer – documented on the ITVBe series – but just last month she admitted she was moving on. 
In a live chat with the TOWIE cast, Kate was asked about her love life – and revealed that she has been "seeing someone" since her break-up in July. 
Asked whether she'd been getting smoochy with anyone, she blushed and said: "No, not just a kiss. I've been dating, out and about – you know, that sort of stuff. 
"I have got with one guy since breaking up with Dan." Kate's ex Dan in an episode of TOWIE last year (Photo: ITV) Read More TOWIE's Megan McKenna and Pete Wicks redo their first date after putting year of drama behind them 
But when she was questioned about how far she'd gone with the new man, she refused to answer, stating it was "too personal" and "unfair". 
It's thought the two were introduced by mutual friends in Essex, but it may be some time before they're ready to go public given how Rio hasn't dated anyone since Rebecca passed away. Like us on Facebook
